analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0xbab3972d8baf95263a137bc0e3290a40224d95cb.sol#532-581):
	External calls:
	- taylorToken.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0xbab3972d8baf95263a137bc0e3290a40224d95cb.sol#563-565)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(ch) (/unique_chucks/3/0xbab3972d8baf95263a137bc0e3290a40224d95cb.sol#543-545)
	- msg.sender.transfer(change) (/unique_chucks/3/0xbab3972d8baf95263a137bc0e3290a40224d95cb.sol#556-558)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- poolEthSold (/unique_chucks/3/0xbab3972d8baf95263a137bc0e3290a40224d95cb.sol#571-572)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/3/0xbab3972d8baf95263a137bc0e3290a40224d95cb.sol#565)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0xbab3972d8baf95263a137bc0e3290a40224d95cb.sol#532-581) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-taylorToken.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0xbab3972d8baf95263a137bc0e3290a40224d95cb.sol#563-565)

Crowdsale.finalizeSale (/unique_chucks/3/0xbab3972d8baf95263a137bc0e3290a40224d95cb.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-taylorToken.burn(taylorToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/3/0xbab3972d8baf95263a137bc0e3290a40224d95cb.sol)
